dishes.name: Ice Cream
dishes.description: Raspberry Coconut Ice Cream. The perfect dessert for summer. ZERO refined sugar and dairy free too!

dishes.name: Cheese Cake
dishes.description: A delectable, semi-sweet New York Style Cheese Cake, with cracker crust and spiced with Indian cardamoms

dishes.name: French Fries
dishes.label: New
dishes.description: These are deep-fried, very thin, salted slices of potato that are usually served at room temperature. French fries have numerous variants, from thick-cut to shoestring, crinkle, curly and many other names.

dishes.name: Chicken Biryani
dishes.description: An amalgamation of 2 of the most favorite Desi food, Chicken tikka and biryani…together makes this delectable spicy (chatpati) biryani

dishes.name: Ginger Burger
dishes.label: Hot
dishes.description: This chicken burger gets an Asian-flavor twist with ginger and garlic. It\'s topped off with a fabulous coleslaw. If you like, serve the coleslaw as a side for grilled items, like chicken breasts, fish fillets or chops

dishes.name: 7UP
dishes.description: Get inspired to mix it up a little with 7UP! Crisp and refreshing, it mixes into all kinds of drinks, cocktails, punches, baked goods, and more, perfect for you!

dishes.name: BBQ Chicken Pizza
dishes.description: BBQ chicken pizza with tangy BBQ sauce, chicken, and red onion. Gouda cheese gives the homemade pizza the most delicious smoky flavor and cilantro adds a touch of freshness. My pizza dough recipe makes enough for two 12-inch pizzas, so you can freeze half for later. It’s an easy thick-style pizza crust with unbeatable flavor.

dishes.name: Coca-cola
dishes.description: Get inspired to mix it up a little with Coca-cola! Crisp and refreshing, it mixes into all kinds of drinks, cocktails, punches, baked goods, and more, perfect for you!

dishes.name: Fried Rice
dishes.description: When it comes to a one-pot meal, quick fried rice can be the best bet. However, if you want to up your protein intake, then you can add generous pieces of chicken and make a flavourful chicken fried rice. Here, we share a Chicken Fried Rice recipe that is easy to make and is an ideal fix for a lazy lunch or dinner.
